title: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi
fullTitle: Behzat Ç.: Bir Ankara Polisiyesi (TV Series 2010–2019)

episodes.title: 39. Bölüm
episodes.plot: After crashing into a car while drunk and yelling into a phone, a surgery technician is strangled at home. An unstable Behzat awaits trial in prison.

episodes.title: 40. Bölüm
episodes.plot: While examining the body of an unidentified man found in a lake, Ghost sees an embroidered monogram that triggers childhood memories.

episodes.title: Kesik Parmak
episodes.plot: In his mailbox, Cevdet finds a CD containing video of an unidentified man being tortured and killed in a fashion similar to a case from 15 years ago.

episodes.title: Yüzünü Arayan Kadin
episodes.plot: To investigate the drug links to the finger-chopping case, the police chief partners Behzat with the headstrong leader of the narcotics unit.

episodes.title: Kara'dir Su Bahtim...
episodes.plot: When a homeless woman is found stabbed to death on a neighborhood street, Behzat's team has difficulty uncovering her real name, let alone her killer.

episodes.title: Benim Annem Cumartesi!
episodes.plot: An elderly Kurdish woman seeks help in finding out who killed her son, who went missing 30 years ago after being arrested at a protest in Ankara.

episodes.title: Büyük Hesaplasma/Filler Tepisirken
episodes.plot: Hearing a gunshot over the phone, Behzat's team rushes to save one of their own. Facebook messages provide leads in a high school boy's murder.

episodes.title: Kandaki Mesaj
episodes.plot: Vulture finds a creepy item in his home. While investigating a murder in his old neighborhood, Harun runs into his former fiancee.

episodes.title: Cürümüs Bir Seyler Var Ankara'da
episodes.plot: When a touring stage actor meets the same demise as the character he is playing, Hamlet, the homicide team is tasked with finding his murderer.

episodes.title: Kalbim Babama Ait
episodes.plot: The team investigates the case of a transgender woman found dead on a roadside. Behzat comes home to find his ex-wife acting like they never divorced.

episodes.title: 49. Bölüm
episodes.plot: The investigation of an unemployed family man's murder reveals he owed a large debt to a dangerous person, whom Behzat recognizes from a past case.

episodes.title: 50. Bölüm
episodes.plot: A political cartoonist's murder gives rise to speculation that he was killed by a religious conservative group over an upcoming cartoon on evolution.

episodes.title: 51. Bölüm
episodes.plot: When a man is found dead in a remote shack, Behzat recognizes him as one of Ercüment's henchmen. Tekin's young daughter is kidnapped.

episodes.title: 52. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Behzat learns the recent murders of a boxer in a hotel room and a woman in a tub were inspired by a novel series, and a third killing is yet to come.

episodes.title: Büyük Tezgah
episodes.plot: The case of a doctor killed in her home appears to be a theft gone wrong. But when a suspect turns up dead, it's clear something bigger is going on.

episodes.title: Veterinerin Sir Ölümü
episodes.plot: Behzat and his team anxiously wait to interrogate Tacettin once he regains consciousness. A veterinarian is found strangled with a dog collar.

episodes.title: Geçmisle Yüzlesmek
episodes.plot: Harun learns his sister is investigating Larissa. A worker's murder leads Behzat's team to spy on an appliance store, where shady activity is spotted.

episodes.title: 56. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Four pals steal a large amount of cash found on a driver who was knocked unconscious during a car crash. But their lucky find soon leads to murder.

episodes.title: Geçmisin Arkandan Gelecektir
episodes.plot: After an elderly man is shot dead at close range while hunting, Behzat's team finds a witness: a senile pal who thinks he's still living in the 1950s.

episodes.title: Basim Belada
episodes.plot: An address found on a man shot dead in the street leads to a nightclub musician, who denies killing him despite a blood feud between their families.

episodes.title: Derin Iliskiler
episodes.plot: Behzat finds a shocking link between an old friend and the murder of a company informant digging for insider information on a $60 million deal.

episodes.title: 60. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Two bumbling wedding musicians land in hot water when they agree to hide a groom with cold feet at their home, only to find him dead later that night.

episodes.title: Nikah Masasi
episodes.plot: Behzat's big day arrives. In an odd twist on an honor killing, a man is found stabbed to death, with a sex doll -- also stabbed -- laying nearby.

episodes.title: Kentsel Bölüsüm
episodes.plot: When a property developer who'd recently acquired land in the slums is shot dead, Behzat's team visits the angry residents who are being displaced.

episodes.title: 63. Bölüm
episodes.plot: While investigating the murder of a young worker at a car rental agency, the team learns the victim recently got int a fight at a bar with Savas.

episodes.title: Bir Cinayetin Geçmisi
episodes.plot: The strangling of a well-liked doctor seems without motive, until the last person to talk to the victim -- a cured patient -- is caught telling a lie.

episodes.title: Kayip Ceset
episodes.plot: A cab driver reports seeing one of his regular clients getting stabbed and buried, but when the team arrives at the burial site, the body is missing.

episodes.title: 66. Bölüm
episodes.plot: A truck driver smuggling arms is pulled over by thieves posing as cops and killed, but the hijackers fail to cover all their tracks.

episodes.title: Sular Bulanirken
episodes.plot: A body is discovered at the same site where the severed fingers were found. The homicide team continues to search for Ghost.

episodes.title: 68. Bölüm
episodes.plot: Ercüment returns to Ankara and targets Esra. Behzat searches for his mother's killer. Selim allows a detail to slip that makes Cevdet suspicious.

episodes.title: Akintiya Karsi...
episodes.plot: When Esra refuses to give up her investigation and is sent to jail on false charges, Behzat sets out to take down Ercüment. Aziz finds his quarry.
